description: Common animation patterns and techniques for web interfaces with implementation examples

items.name: Staggered Sequential Reveal
items.description: Elements appear one after another with consistent delay between each item
items.example: Page load animations, list item reveals, dropdown menu appearances

items.name: Page Load Orchestration
items.description: Coordinated multi-layer entrance sequence for landing page initial view
items.example: Landing page hero sections, product launches, premium website introductions
items.performance: Carefully sequenced to avoid layout thrashing

items.name: Hover State Microinteraction
items.description: Subtle interactive feedback on element hover with scale and glow effects
items.example: Button interactions, card hovers, link emphasis, navigation feedback

items.name: Scroll Trigger Fade-In
items.description: Elements fade and slide into view when scrolled into viewport
items.example: Landing page sections, content reveals, image galleries, statistics counters
items.performance: Requires Intersection Observer API for performance

items.name: Loading Skeleton Pulse
items.description: Subtle pulsing animation indicating content loading state
items.example: Content placeholders, data loading states, skeleton screens, image loading

items.name: Modal Entrance & Exit
items.description: Coordinated animation for modal/dialog overlay and content entrance
items.example: Dialog boxes, confirmation modals, information overlays, form popups

items.name: Parallax Scroll Effect
items.description: Background and foreground elements move at different speeds on scroll
items.example: Hero section depth effects, background imagery, immersive scrolling experiences
items.performance: Use will-change, limit to critical elements, consider requestAnimationFrame
